languages.text: {n}Ответ лежит на поверхности. Этот кровожадный воин просто спятил в неволе. Если подумать, вряд ли он был полностью нормален и до плена.{/n}
{n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ответ лежит на поверхности. Этот кровожадный воин просто спятил в неволе. Если подумать, вряд ли он был полностью нормален и до плена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The answer is obvious. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}
{n}The answer is obvious. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}
{n}The answer is obvious. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}
{n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}答案似乎显而易见。这位嗜血的战士遭到了囚禁，脑子也已经变得不正常了。仔细想想，说不定他在被俘之前，就已经有点精神错乱的迹象了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}答案显而易见。这位嗜血的战士遭到了囚禁，脑子也已经变得不正常了。仔细想想，说不定他在被俘之前，就已经有点精神错乱的迹象了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La respuesta te resulta evidente. Este guerrero sanguinario ha enloquecido durante su cautiverio. Pensándolo bien, probablemente estuviera un poco loco antes de ser capturado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta es obvia. Este guerrero sanguinario ha enloquecido durante su cautiverio. Pensándolo bien, probablemente estuviera un poco loco antes de ser capturado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}答えは明らかだ。この血に飢えた戦士は、囚われの身となって気が狂ったのだ。考えてみれば、捕虜になる前から、彼は少し気が狂っていたのかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}答えは明らかだ。この血に飢えた戦士は、囚われの身となって気が狂ったのだ。考えてみれば、捕虜になる前から、彼は少し気が狂っていたのかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Antwort scheint dir klar. Dieser blutrünstige Krieger hat in der Gefangenschaft schlicht den Verstand verloren. Im Grunde war er wohl schon leicht geistesgestört, bevor er überhaupt gefangen genommen wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Antwort ist offensichtlich. Dieser blutrünstige Krieger hat in der Gefangenschaft schlicht den Verstand verloren. Im Grunde war er wohl schon leicht geistesgestört, bevor er überhaupt je gefangen genommen wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse vous paraît évidente. La captivité a tout simplement rendu fou ce guerrier assoiffé de sang. Maintenant que vous y pensez, il devait déjà être bien atteint avant même de tomber entre les mains de l'ennemi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réponse est évidente. La captivité a tout simplement rendu fou ce guerrier assoiffé de sang. Maintenant que vous y pensez, il devait déjà être bien atteint avant même de tomber entre les mains ennemies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cevap senin için çok bariz. Bu kana susamış savaşçı, tutsakken aklını kaçırmış. Bir düşününce muhtemelen tutsak edilmeden önce de hafif sıyırmıştı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The answer seems clear to you. This bloodthirsty warrior has simply gone mad in captivity. Come to think of it, he was probably slightly deranged even before he was taken prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cevap senin için çok bariz. Bu kana susamış savaşçı, tutsakken aklını kaçırmış. Bir düşününce muhtemelen tutsak olmadan önce de hafif sıyırmış hâldedir.{/n}
